com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.util

Class SOAPHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.util.SOAPHelper

  • public class SOAPHelper
extends Object
    This class offers some helper methods for handling SOAPMessage objects.
    Author:
    Petteri Kivim√§ki

    • Method Detail

      • getNode

        public static Node getNode(Node node,
           String nodeName)
        Goes through all the child nodes of the given node and returns the first child that matches the given name. If no child with the given is found, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        node - parent node
        nodeName - name of the node to be searched
        Returns:
        node with the given name or null

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(SOAPMessage message)
        Converts the given SOAPMessage to byte array.
        Parameters:
        message - SOAPMessage object to be converted
        Returns:
        byte array containing the SOAPMessage or null

      • toString

        public static String toString(SOAPMessage message)
        Converts the given SOAPMessage to String.
        Parameters:
        message - SOAPMessage object to be converted
        Returns:
        String presentation of the given SOAPMessage

      • toString

        public static String toString(Node node)
        Converts the given Node to String.
        Parameters:
        node - Node object to be converted
        Returns:
        String presentation of the given Node

      • toString

        public static String toString(AttachmentPart att)
        Converts the given attachment part to string.
        Parameters:
        att - attachment part to be converted
        Returns:
        string presentation of the attachment or null

      • toSOAP

        public static SOAPMessage toSOAP(String soap)
        Converts the given String to SOAPMessage. The String must contain a valid SOAP message, otherwise null is returned.
        Parameters:
        soap - SOAP string to be converted
        Returns:
        SOAPMessage or null

      • toSOAP

        public static SOAPMessage toSOAP(InputStream is)
        Converts the given InputStream to SOAPMessage. The stream must contain a valid SOAP message, otherwise null is returned.
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream to be converted
        Returns:
        SOAPMessage or null

      • toSOAP

        public static SOAPMessage toSOAP(InputStream is,
                 MimeHeaders mh)
        Converts the given InputStream to SOAPMessage. The stream must contain a valid SOAP message, otherwise null is returned.
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream to be converted
        mh - MIME headers of the SOAP request
        Returns:
        SOAPMessage or null

      • nodesToMap

        public static Map<String,String> nodesToMap(NodeList list)
        Transfers the given NodeList to a Map that contains all the list items as key-value-pairs, localName as the key and textContent as the value.
        Parameters:
        list - NodeList to be transfered
        Returns:
        Map that contains all the list items as key-value-pairs

      • nodesToMap

        public static Map<String,String> nodesToMap(NodeList list,
                            boolean upperCase)
        Transfers the given NodeList to a Map that contains all the list items as key-value-pairs, localName as the key and textContent as the value.
        Parameters:
        list - NodeList to be transfered
        upperCase - store all keys in upper case
        Returns:
        Map that contains all the list items as key-value-pairs

      • addNamespace

        public static void addNamespace(Node node,
                AbstractMessage message)
        Adds the namespace URI and prefix of the ProvideMember related to the given Message to the given Node and all its children. If the Node should have another namespace, the old namespace is first removed and the new namespace is added after that.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to be modified
        message - Message that contains the ProviderMember which namespace URI and prefix are used

      • removeNamespace

        public static void removeNamespace(Node node)
        Removes the namespace from the given Node and all its children.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to be modified

      • getStringAttachment

        public static String getStringAttachment(String contentId,
                         Iterator attachments)
        Searches the attachment with the given content id and returns its string contents. If there's no attachement with the given content id or its value is not a string, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        contentId - content id of the attachment
        attachments - list of attachments to be searched
        Returns:
        string value of the attachment or null

      • getAttachmentContentType

        public static String getAttachmentContentType(SOAPMessage message)
        Returns the content type of the first SOAP attachment or null if there's no attachments.
        Parameters:
        message - SOAP message
        Returns:
        content type of the first attachemt or null

      • hasAttachments

        public static boolean hasAttachments(SOAPMessage message)
        Checks if the given SOAP message has attachments. Returns true if and only if the message has attachments. Otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        message - SOAP message to be checked
        Returns:
        true if and only if the message has attachments; otherwise false

      • xmlStrToSOAPElement

        public static SOAPElement xmlStrToSOAPElement(String xml)
        Converts the given XML string to SOAPElement.
        Parameters:
        xml - XML string
        Returns:
        given XML string as a SOAPElement or null if the conversion failed
